0.1.name: wordpress/pictage-link
0.1.description:
Note: This plugin is for Pictage members.

This plugin generates a list of your active events and attaches a stylesheet to allow customizable options such as hover color, font style, font weight, alignment and basically anything you can do with CSS to look much more integrated with your Wordpress website/blog.

It also attaches the JQuery library for some nice looking effects. (Soon to be more customizable).

You simply add the list of events by adding the [piclink] shortlink to any post or page.
